text:
Face recognition feature very easy to game. Frequent disruptive server migration services. App is not available on Play Store, have to download through dodgy Apk method. No app updates at all.

Edit to response to business: Nice to see your app on Play Store. However, now I cannot access my apartment through the app despite switching on all permission, very good job üëè
Disruptive app for homes, would think twice before engaging this 'software developer' for your smart home needs. Very poor interface on Aliv that feels clunky and slow to load.
